scripts.serve:staging: npm run set-deps && firebase use staging && npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions &npm run build:watch
scripts.serve:prod: npm run set-deps && firebase use production && npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions &npm run build:watch
scripts.shell: npm run set-deps && npm run build && firebase functions:shell
scripts.start: npm run set-deps && npm run shell
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run set-deps && firebase use staging && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run set-deps && firebase use production && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.dev: npm run set-deps && firebase use staging && npm run build && firebase emulators:start --import ~/Desktop/vsf/firebase-state --export-on-exit ~/Desktop/vsf/firebase-state & npm run build:watch
